summary: Changes the nighteye powers (For khajiits and vampires) into constant effects, so you don\'t have to keep casting them.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the lesser power nighteye effects (Vampire\'s Sight and Eye of Night) into constant effects with no duration, so you don\'t have to keep casting it every minute.

It most likely conflicts with any mod that alters the nighteye script, or any of the nighteye powers (for vampires, khajiits, and the unused werewolf one).
author: MasterZipZero
